Image Classification: Feature-based 
methods
•Bag of words (also known as bag of features or bag of keypoints)
◦ computes the distribution (histogram) of visual words found in the query image
◦ compares this distribution to those found in the training images
•The biggest difference from instance recognition is the absence of a geometric 
verification stage since individual instances of generic visual categories, have 
relatively little spatial coherence to their features.
